# Sofía Camará (drag queen)

Pablo Carayani Camará (born 1 March 1991), better known by the stage name Sofía Camará, is an Argentine drag performer who competed on the second season of The Switch Drag Race, where she was a finalist.
Filmography
Television
* The Switch Drag Race
